HexGrid
MonoBehaviour
public
HexGrid

This class houses our hex grid chunks, which in turn house the individual cells. This class also keeps a global list of all active units.

Variables
chunkCountX
public int chunkCountX

Sets the number of chunks we want on the x axis.

chunkCountZ
public int chunkCountZ

Sets the number of chunks we want on the z axis.

cellCountX
int cellCountX
cellCountZ
int cellCountZ
cellPrefab
public HexCell cellPrefab

A reference to the prefab for hex cells.

units
List<HexUnit> units

HexCell[] cells
cellLabelPrefab
public Text cellLabelPrefab

A reference to the UI elsement for the label showing the coordinates of a cell

cellIconPrefab;

A reference to the only currently existing icon that can be added to cells.

cellIconPrefab
public Image cellIconPrefab
defaultColor
public Color defaultColor

The color that is selected if no color is set on the color picker in the UI.

chunkPrefab
public HexGridChunk chunkPrefab

Reference to the prefab for the grid chunk game object.

chunks
HexGridChunk[] chunks
hasTowns
HexCell[] hasTowns

GetCell
public HexCell GetCell(
Vector3 position
)

This method returns the cell in the position given by finding out the coordinates of the cell in the grid, and using them to find the cell in the master array of all cells.

When called on with a Ray, it feeds the ray's hit.point as the position.

Parameters
position
Vector3

the position vector for where we are looking for a cell

ray

a ray that checks if there is a cell there-

Returns

The hex in that position, if any.
